Hi All,

I have Heritrix 2.0 and we have written an writer Processor which writes into mysql DB instead of the Arc Writer Processor.
I am trying to build an multi-lingual search index and for the same reason I was crawling some sites other than English.

But strangely I am getting the following unknown errors. Can someone help to get rid of these. I am pasting a block of results for the same.
